ResearchProjectDef.label: Dining room furniture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: It opens the possibility of building some new furniture for dining room, such as Long Table and Stool.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dining room furniture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: It opens the possibility of building Dining Chair in dining room for comfort of your colonists.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dining room furniture III
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research unlocks Modern Tables and Serving Tables fo dining room.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dining room furniture IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research unlocks Beauty Dining Chair fo dining room.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Recreation furniture room I
ResearchProjectDef.description: It opens methods of obtaining pleasure by constructing and playing in Archery Target and Horseshoe Pin.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Recreation furniture room II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in pleasure give your colonists the ability to build some Boardgames, Bookcases and Couches.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Recreation furniture room III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in pleasure give your colonists the ability to build some Billiards and Television.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Recreation furniture room IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Final research in pleasure and rest unlocks Glasswork TV and Telescope.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bedroom furniture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: It opens methods of obtaining rest in bedrooms by constructing Comfy Bed and End Table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bedroom furniture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in rest give your colonists the ability to build some Comfortable Beds and Reading Tables.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bedroom furniture III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in rest give your colonists the ability to build some Armchairs and Luxury Beds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bedroom furniture IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Final research in pleasure and rest unlocks Comfy Seats and Stylish Beds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ergonomics I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced research in ergonomics allows building and construction of Small Tool Cabinet and some Cooking Tools to speed up work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ergonomics II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research in ergonomics allows building and construction of File Cabinet and some Tool Cabinet to speed up work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ergonomics III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further research in ergonomics allows building and construction of Multi Analyzer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hyglene I
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to build crematoriums, which can incinerate unwanted corpses, apparel and materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hyglene II
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to build electric crematoriums, which can incinerate unwanted corpses, apparel and materials faster.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "So where did I put this pistol? What a mess!" \n Unlocks Feeding Bowl, Hamper, Pallet and Skip.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research in storage technologies allows building and construction of Cupboards, Shelves and Racks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage III
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Beam me up... Um, no seriously, how does this work?" \n"This is an advanced storage solution. When placed under a stockpile zone it will attempt to pile up adjacent items on top of itself, well over normal storage limits. Unlocks HazMat Container and Refrigerated Rack."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Logistics I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of the basic elements of the conveyor belts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Logistics II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research in logistics technologies allows building advanced elements of the conveyor belts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Logistics III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further research in logistics technologies allows building more advanced elements of the conveyor belts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Logistics IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Final research in logistics technologies allows building highgrade elements of the conveyor belts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Training facilities I
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to construct some Autopsy Tables - doctors can hone their skills by testing their techniques on corpses; and Punching Bags - a man-able punching bag that your colonists can use to practice their melee skills with.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Training facilities II
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to construct some Holodecks - a man-able holosuite that your colonists can use to practice their social skills with.
